title: Firstborn
description: There's a war raging between the forces of Heaven and Hell; and, as if he didn't have enough to deal with from his own issues, his sister has chosen the wrong side. And now he's got angels, demons, talking pets and a Japanese monster to contend with. Begin following the misadventures of Erik Ashendale in this first full length novel of the Legacy series.
author: Ryan Attard
